message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI, cs.CR 

The paper proposes a method for person recognition using deep learning techniques. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also focuses on training a network to obtain robust and representative features, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper mentions using softmax with normalized inputs, which could indicate that it belongs to cs.MM (Multimedia). The paper also proposes a novel loss function, which could suggest that it belongs to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper deals with the issue of inter-class distinction and inner-class variance, which could indicate that it belongs to cs.CR (Cryptography and Security).
